{"id":717928382,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1654758838,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"51 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/717928382/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        \n        \n        int ans = 0 ;\n        map <char ,int> m ;\n        int start =0 ;\n        int end =0 ;\n        while(end <s.size()){\n            char c = s[end];\n            for(auto it:m){\n                if(it.first == c && it.second >=start && it.second <end){\n                    start = it.second+1;\n                }\n            }\n            m[c] = end++;\n            ans = max(ans ,end-start);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
